entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
